solution_line_template: Donny saves a total of ${monday_savings}+${tuesday_savings}+${wednesday_savings} = $<<{monday_savings}+{tuesday_savings}+{wednesday_savings}={total_savings_three_days}>>{total_savings_three_days} across all 3 days
He spends half of his total savings which is ${total_savings_three_days}*({half_fraction}) = $<<{total_savings_three_days}*({half_fraction})={amount_spent}>>{amount_spent}
